item.title: Hugo github CI using azure devops
item.description: Content Basic requirements Tools Why do i pick Azure Detailed CI flow Setup Azure Pipelines CI Prepare the CD GitHub deploy keys Azure secret file CD Basic requirements Trigger CI system at PR (pull request) Give feedback to the user that the PR have passed When I merge the pull, automatically publish my updated blog. The last one is already solved thanks to that i use GitHub static page to share my homepage.
